mapper.sql: id, code, bill_date, warehouse_id, medicine_id, sys_user_id, agent_id, commercial_company_id, sale_price, sale_money, quantity, units, descript, create_date, update_date, del_flag

xssq.id,xssq.code, bill_date,warehouse_id, medicine_id, sys_user_id, agent_id,commercial_company_id, sale_price, sale_money, quantity, xssq.units, xssq.descript, xssq.create_date, xssq.update_date, xssq.del_flag,su.username as operator_name, m.name as medicine_name, a.name as agent_name,c.name as commercial_company_name,w.name as warehouse_name
mapper.select:
select
from xssq_order xssq, warehouse w, sys_user su, medicine m, agent a, commercial_company c where xssq.del_flag = 0 and w.id = xssq.warehouse_id AND su.id = xssq.sys_user_id AND m.id = xssq.medicine_id AND c.id = xssq.commercial_company_id AND a.id = xssq.agent_id AND xssq.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update xssq_order
bill_date = #{billDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medicine_id = #{medicineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sys_user_id = #{sysUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commercial_company_id = #{commercialCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AND sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND sale_money = #{saleMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=BIT},
units = #{units,jdbcType=BIT},
descript = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
